TopicTitle: HGR 1.875m parts R&D Thread [Mod reboot in progress] (First Dev build now available)

Articles.Content:
I'm going to be posting up the actual HGRbeta Ver.0.23 soon Everything seems to be working correctly, I just need to double check with the DRE update. To celebrate I made a quick alt color for the Soy-Juice.

http://i.imgur.com/faR0xgH.jpg

What about a black foil-y texture?

Hey Orion. How about this? Side project for HGR maybe? They're stockalike 5m parts.

http://i.imgur.com/PRR7pmx.png

So, this first on on the left was removed?

http://i.imgur.com/PRR7pmx.png

Yes but there's still a separate download for it on the OP.
There any difference between the release in this thread and the other thread?

There any difference between the release in this thread and the other thread?

Yea the other doesn't have the Lima or the PMK right now as I felt that they weren't release ready. This version will also always receive more frequent updates and the newest parts. If you're already using the beta there's no reason to switch over.
Fair enough

Arn't you really asking for Stock alike reskins for KWR?

Not anymore.

I love this mod! Nice job! And i also wan't to ask, do you plan to make a Stock-like N1 Rocket and LK Lander for HGR?

That would be the absolute best!
does anyone have a texture switch config for the soy juice descent pod so that when i use the alternate textures, it wouldn't look weird whenever i use the onion?
With the alternate textures, make them look like they have thermal blankets instead of straight up colors.

How do you install the alternate service module and the alternate soy-juice texture? Also I think this mod will benefit greatly if you create a lander capable of reaching the Mun and possibly Minmus. Great work!

With the alternate textures, make them look like they have thermal blankets instead of straight up colors.

The thing is that an alternate color doesn't take a huge amount of time, whereas to do a thermal blanket texture properly would basically mean creating an entire new texture. With so many other things to do in the mod and the limited time I have to work on the mod an alternate color was all I had time for. I do plan to texture the Lima in thermal blanket style, which I know is not exactly what people want but it's at least a start. At some point and time I may try to make one for the soy-juice, but it won't be until more of the mod is complete.

How do you install the alternate service module and the alternate soy-juice texture? Also I think this mod will benefit greatly if you create a lander capable of reaching the Mun and possibly Minmus. Great work!

For both files the end goal is to merge the HGR files with those installed on your computer. Merging the GameData files will achieve this same goal as the paths have been been set up for this. The alternate texture will ask if you want to overwrite the existing one and just say yes to all. I'll be looking into and trying to familiarize myself with texture switcher so that in the future it will be easier to go between them.

When you say a lander that can reach the moon, do you mean a craft file?
Did notice a minor "issue" the alternate service module (with the 4 nozelles) has a much lower cost than the standard one. Not sure if intended or just an oversight.

How do you install the alternate service module and the alternate soy-juice texture? Also I think this mod will benefit greatly if you create a lander capable of reaching the Mun and possibly Minmus. Great work!

Minmus Lander:

(Legs are from AIES, but Stock should work, there's also other bits there)

Mun Lander:

(Legs are AIES, panels are B9, but there is the 1.85m small tank and the G90 (The small engine) under everything)

(Legs are from AIES, but Stock should work, there's also other bits there)

Mun Lander:

(Legs are AIES, panels are B9, but there is the 1.85m small tank and the G90 (The small engine) under everything)

Those RCS, where they from?

Those RCS, where they from?

Part of the B9 pack.

Part of the B9 pack.

Yep, both landers were made before Orion came out with his flat ones (Or I would have used those)

Yep, both landers were made before Orion came out with his flat ones (Or I would have used those)

Are mine flatter than those b9 ones?

Are mine flatter than those b9 ones?

Flatter and much more low profile. The B9 ones have a bump for the center port whereas yours just have the center port, yours look so much better because of it.

The thing is that an alternate color doesn't take a huge amount of time, whereas to do a thermal blanket texture properly would basically mean creating an entire new texture. With so many other things to do in the mod and the limited time I have to work on the mod an alternate color was all I had time for. I do plan to texture the Lima in thermal blanket style, which I know is not exactly what people want but it's at least a start. At some point and time I may try to make one for the soy-juice, but it won't be until more of the mod is complete.
